answers: Murakaza neza kuri IremboGov! Mushobora kubaza ikibazo cyose kijyanye na serivisi za Leta.

utterances: ni izihe serivisi ziboneka kuri irembo
answers: IremboGov ni urubuga rutanga serivisi za Leta mu buryo bw'ikoranabuhanga. Ruborohereza gusaba no kwishyura serivisi zitandukanye za Leta.

Kugira ngo usabe indangamuntu, ukeneye: 1) Kuba ufite imyaka 16 cyangwa irenga 2) Icyemezo cy'amavuko 3) Kuzuza ifishi yo gusaba. Ushobora gusaba ukoresheje urubuga rwa www.irembo.gov.rw cyangwa ugasura ibiro by'Umurenge.
Gusaba pasiporo bikorwa kuri www.irembo.gov.rw. Ukeneye: 1) Indangamuntu 2) Ifoto yawe 3) Kwishyura amafaranga ya pasiporo. Pasiporo isanzwe imara imyaka 5, naho iy'umwana imara imyaka 2.
Ushobora kwishyura ukoresheje: 1) Mobile Money (MTN, Airtel) 2) Ikarita ya banki 3) Kwishyurira kuri banki 4) Agent wa Irembo.

utterances: nkora nte kugira ngo mbone icyemezo cyo gushyingirwa
answers: Kugira ngo usabe icyemezo cyo gushyingirwa ukeneye: 1) Indangamuntu zawe n'uwo mugiye gushyingirwa 2) Icyemezo cy'amavuko 3) Icyemezo cy'uko uri ingaragu. Ushobora gusaba binyuze kuri www.irembo.gov.rw
Murakora mwongere mugerageze. Niba ikibazo gikomeje, mushobora guhamagara umurongo wacu utishyurwa 9099 cyangwa mutubandikire kuri support@irembo.rw
Turi kuvugurura urubuga IremboGov mu ishusho nshya dushingiye ku bitekerezo mwaduhaye. Tubafitiye ibindi bishya bigamije kuborohereza gusaba serivisi za leta!

Icyemezo cy'uko uri ingaragu gitangwa n'ubuyobozi, kigaragaza ko uri ingaragu. Gisaba 500 RWF, kimara umunsi 1 gutunganywa. Gifite agaciro k'amezi 3. Gishobora gukoreshwa mu gushaka, gusaba inguzanyo muri banki cyangwa ubwishingizi.

utterances: nkora nte kugira ngo mbone icyemezo cy'ubutane
answers: Inyandiko y'Ubutane ihabwa abanyarwanda bamaze gusesa amasezerano yo gushyingirwa. Isaba 1,500 RWF, imara umunsi 1 gutunganywa. Ukeneye kugaragaza icyemezo cy'urukiko cyemeza ubutane.

utterances: nkora nte kugira ngo nemeze ko ndi imfubyi
answers: Iyi serivisi ntiyishyurwa, imara umunsi 1 gutunganywa. Usabwa kugaragaza icyemezo cy'urupfu rw'umubyeyi cyangwa icyemezo cy'urukiko.
Iyi serivisi ntiyishyurwa, imara umunsi 1 gutunganywa. Igenewe abanditse nk'abatishoboye bacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside muri system ya MINUBUMWE. Icyemezo gikoreshwa mu gusaba inkunga ya MINUBUMWE.

utterances: nkora nte kugira ngo mbone ibaruwa y'ubumuga
answers: Iyi serivisi ntiyishyurwa, imara iminsi 2 gutunganywa. Usabwa kugaragaza ikarita y'ubumuga ya NCPD. Iyi baruwa igufasha kubona serivisi zose no kuzamura imibereho yawe.

utterances: nkora nte kugira ngo mbone icyemezo cyo kuzungura
answers: Icyemezo cyo Kuzungura gitangirwa ku murenge uwitabye Imana yari atuyemo. Ntiyishyurwa, imara iminsi 3 gutunganywa. Ukeneye kugaragaza imyanzuru y'inama y'umuryango. Amafishi 7 na 29 (ku butaka) ushobora kuyasanga ku murenge.

utterances: nkora nte kugira ngo mbone icyemezo cy'uko nashyingiwe
answers: Icyemezo cy'imibanire y'abashyingiranwe gisaba 1,500 RWF, kimara umunsi 1 gutunganywa. Ukeneye kugaragaza: 1) Kopi ya Pasiporo (ku banyamahanga) 2) Kimwe mu byemezo bikurikira: Icyemezo cyo gushyingirwa, Inyandiko Mpine y'Ishyingirwa, cyangwa Inyandiko y'Ishyingirwa.

utterances: nkora nte kugira ngo mbone icyemezo cy'ubupfakazi
answers: Icyemezo cy'Ubupfakazi gisaba 1,500 RWF, kimara umunsi 1 gutunganywa. Gitangwa n'umurenge, kigaragaza irangamimerere y'uwasabye nyuma y'uko uwo bashakanye yitabye Imana.

utterances: nkora nte kugira ngo mbone icyemezo cy'amavuko
answers: Icyemezo cy'amavuko gisaba 500 RWF, kimara umunsi 1 gutunganywa. Gitangirwa ku murenge. Ushobora gusabwa kugaragaza: 1) Pasiporo ya Nyina 2) Pasiporo ya Se 3) Kopi ya pasiporo y'Umenyekanisha.

utterances: nkora nte kugira ngo nandukuze uwapfuye
answers: Kwandukuza umuntu witabye Imana ntibisaba amafaranga, bimara umunsi 1. Ukeneye: 1) Icyemezo cy'ibitaro cy'urupfu (niba yapfiriye mu bitaro) 2) Raporo y'Akagari 3) Kopi ya Pasiporo (ku banyamahanga) 4) Icyemezo cy'urukiko (niba hashize iminsi 15 urupfu rutarandikwa).
